description: Following the Shogun Assassination-arc and the creation of new government, the Shinsengumi were blamed for the murder of a former shogun and disbanded. However, after witnessing the tyranny of Hitotsubashi Nobunobu, Hijikata Toushirou regrouped the former Shinsengumi in order to rescue Matsudaira Katakuriko and KoFarewello. After the events of Farawell Shinsengumi-arc, the Shinsengumi continued to resist the government and fled from Edo.
name: Rounin Shinsengumi
